title: What is going on at Power of Play on Gordon Road? I\'ve noticed that Jenkins Pre-School moved out and there have been construction workers there. There are playsets out front. Is POP closing and being turned into a playset dealership? Are they renovating the facility? (That would be nice, it was getting very shabby and the toys were old/worn out.) Thank you!
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20111002/ARTICLES/110939993
